WorkItem.Description:
It seems like whenever I attach an PHPWord generated document to an email, and try to read this doc on an Android device, it will not work. I use an Samsung S3, and always get "Polaris Viewer 4.1 has stopped".
Other Android devices get the same error.

Word documents saved from original MS-Word will open without problem as email attachemts, so I think its related to the way PHPWord encodes the document.
WorkItem.Summary: PHPWord docs can't be opened on Android
